alert.note: Alert for Jo Daviess; Stephenson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 11:25AM CST until February 16 at 6:00PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 7 inches. North winds gusting ashigih as 30 to 35 MPH causing blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Illinois and east central, northeast and southeast Iowa. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be well below freezing resulting in fluffy dry snow. Strong winds will cause considerable blowing and drifting snow especially in open and rural areas.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
